dct_title_s: Net-Zero America selected renewable resource projects for reference scenario (base land use), 2050
dct_description_sm: This dataset shows the wind and solar development in the contiguous United States that will be required by 2050 under a reference scenario projecting no changes in energy policy and under more permissive land-use assumptions. For an overview of this "REF" frozen-policy scenario and these "base" land-use assumptions, please refer to the "supplemental information" portion of this record.
dct_creator_sm: Emily Leslie, Energy Reflections, LLC, Principal
Andrew Pascale, Andlinger Center, Princeton University, Post-Doctoral Research Associate
